channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12837] ReplicationAdmin leaks zk connections
item.description: One of the lads here (Chris Leroy) found issue in ReplicationAdmin where we never close up the zk we create in the constructor. He's using it from a program that is trying to give state on replication on a period so the leaking is pronounced in his case (there is also a System.exit in here which messes up hosting programs).

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
